document.docAuthor: Jia, Shao-Bo, Zhang, Yu-Ping, Zhao, Yan & Jordana, Rafael
document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Homidia from China, and description of the dorsal chaetotaxy of all Chinese Homidia species (Collembola: Entomobryidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Homidia from China, and description of the dorsal chaetotaxy of all Chinese Homidia species (Collembola: Entomobryidae)

heading.emphasis:
Key of Chinese species of
Homidia
with known chaetotaxy

subSubSection.paragraph:
(H#, T# and A#––areas defined by
Jordana and Baquero 2005
. Number of macrochaetae per half tergum)

paragraph.keyLead: - Abd. II with 2 and 4 macrochaetae on A 1 and A 2 respectively and Abd. III with 1 macrochaeta on A 3 area........... 2

10 H 1 on head with 3 macrochaetae, A 9 –A 10 on Abd. IV with 2 and 3 macrochaetae respectively
..................... H. leei

- H 1 on head with 5 macrochaetae, A 9 –A 10 on Abd. IV with 1 and 1 macrochaetae respectively............
H. tibetensis

13 Abd. IV with macrochaetae formula A 6 –A 10 : 0–7 –0– 0–4 ( 11 + 11 ) dorsal setae
................................. H. transitoria

- A 9 –A 10 on Abd. IV with 5 and 3 macrochaetae respectively ...............................................................
H. qimenensis

15 T 2 on Th. II with 6 macrochaetae, A 3 –A 5 on Abd. III with 2 macrochaetae, 0, 1, 1 ..............................
H. linhaensis

16 H 3 (S’0) macrochaeta present on the head, A 9 on Abd. IV with 1 macrochaeta
..................................... H. apigmenta
- H 3 (S’0) macrochaeta absent on the head, A 9 on Abd. IV with more than 1 macrochaeta ...................................... 17
